# Development Plan Update Tracking

This file tracks when the iOS development plan was last updated to ensure it stays current.

## Update Process

Every time work is completed:

1. Update the "Recent updates" section in [docs/ios-development-plan.md](../docs/ios-development-plan.md) with the date and completed work
2. Mark completed tasks in the daily sessions timeline with ~~strikethrough~~ and ✅
3. Update status sections (Backend implementation status, Specification documents status, etc.)
4. Document the update here

When completing work, update:

- [ ] "Recent updates" section with date-organized entries
